name: PledgeMusic
author: 45PRESS Team

sections.description:
PledgeMusic is a platform that provides artists the resources they need to build successful long-term careers.
Through our easy to use direct-to-fan model, we’ve fuzed advanced technologies and social media techniques with decades of music business expertise to create the most effective music fundraising, marketing, and sales tool in the world.

Plugin Features:

  • Connect your PledgeMusic campaign to your WordPress site.
  • Two display options: Sidebar widget, or lightbox popup.

Sign up with PledgeMusic now!

Plugin developed by 45PRESS – a digital marketing agency that specializes in website creation, development, hosting, & video production.
sections.installation:
1. Unzip pledgemusic.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory.
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress.
  3. Enter your PledgeMusic ID.
  4. Display your badge via sidebar widget or lightbox popup.
sections.faq:
I need support. Who can I contact?

Limited support is provided by 45PRESS. Please email any questions or comments to info@45press.com.
sections.changelog:
1.2.1

  • Fixed an issue that caused the sidebar widget to display incorrectly on some themes.

1.2

  • Added a sign up link to the plugin’s admin page.

1.1

  • Fixed a bug preventing PledgeMusic ID’s from saving properly in sidebar widgets.
  • Prevented an error from occuring due to an invalid PledgeMusic ID.

1.0.1

  • Increased the width of the lightbox popup to prevent PledgeMusic badge images from being cut off.

1.0

  • Initial version.
